Old cellar with marble tables and stools in crowded tapas bar life with vermouth and terrace.

In the heart of the historic center of Ronda, next to the majestic Royal Collegiate Church of Santa Maria Maggiore , thirty meters from City Hall , also very close to the bridge over the Tagus and the famous Plaza de Toros , it is located El Meson El Sacristan Restaurant . An idyllic place to eat well , surrounded by pieces of the history of this ancient people .
We visited this restaurant and were pleasantly soprendió , preparation of fish is wonderful and excellent care , fully recommended .
One of the best hostels throughout South America! Very nice people , very cool , very good projects , good paintings, good scenery, good kitchen, three ovens ! ... More than recommended, inevitable.
The Guatatur hotel is a modern space in the town of Guatape committed to the local culture and natural environment , offering our guests experiences living amid enchanting landscapes .
Nature reserve area of Lake Guatape , Guatape
A small break from the city in a very nice place

This beautiful monolith of more than 220 meters high, located in the Antiochian East, is one of the main attractions of the department . To reach the top , you need to climb 740 stairs difficult .. but the effort is rewarded with the spectacular view it offers , where you can see the Embalse de Guatapé , accompanied by a cold liquid to calm the thirst and replenish forces to back down. Undoubtedly one of the experiences that can not be missed when you saw Antioquia.

This place has the charm of those constructions in which one thinks more than twice whether or not to climb . The pieda has a staircase that looks like a cord tie these vintage dresses . It is nestled in the middle of the Guatapé dam , a dam that has formed islets marvel sight of the curious who want to visit this part of Colombia . The stone is about an hour from Medellin , the second largest city in the country . Unmissable for those who want to tour the coffee zone .

Guatapé is a municipality of Colombia , located in the subregion East of the department of Antioquia . \ NLimita by the north with the city of Alexandria , in the east with the municipality of San Rafael , south with the municipalities of Granada and El Penol and west with El Penol . \ NYour head is 79 kilometers from the city of Medellin , capital of Antioquia department . \ NThe municipality has an area of ​​69 square kilometers.
